hymn.title: Our hearts are full of Christ and long

layout.singingstanza: Our hearts are full of Christ and long Their glo -- rious mat -- ter to de -- clare! Of Him we make our loft -- ier song, We can -- not from His praise for -- bear: Our rea -- dy tongues make haste to sing The glo -- ries of the heav'n -- ly King.

lyrics.stanza: Our hearts are full of Christ and long Their glorious matter to declare! Of Him we make our loftier song, We cannot from His praise forbear: Our ready tongues make haste to sing The glories of the heav'nly King.

Fairer than all the earthborn race, Perfect in comeliness Thou art; Replenished are Thy lips with grace, And full of love Thy tender heart. God ever-blest! we bow the knee, And own all fulness dwells in Thee.
